VARIABLES.name: x_A
VARIABLES.description: Number of tables ordered from Supplier A

VARIABLES.name: x_B
VARIABLES.description: Number of tables ordered from Supplier B

VARIABLES.name: x_C
VARIABLES.description: Number of tables ordered from Supplier C

VARIABLES.name: y_A
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for ordering from Supplier A

VARIABLES.name: y_B
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for ordering from Supplier B

VARIABLES.name: y_C
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for ordering from Supplier C

PARAMETERS.name: cost_A
PARAMETERS.description: Cost of ordering each dining table from Supplier A

PARAMETERS.name: cost_B
PARAMETERS.description: Cost of ordering each dining table from Supplier B

PARAMETERS.name: cost_C
PARAMETERS.description: Cost of ordering each dining table from Supplier C

PARAMETERS.name: quantity_A_per_order
PARAMETERS.description: Quantity of tables per order from Supplier A

PARAMETERS.name: quantity_B_per_order
PARAMETERS.description: Quantity of tables per order from Suppliers B and C

PARAMETERS.name: quantity_C_per_order
PARAMETERS.description: Quantity of tables per order from Suppliers B and C

PARAMETERS.name: min_orders
PARAMETERS.description: Minimum number of orders from Supplier A, B, or C

PARAMETERS.name: min_tables
PARAMETERS.description: Minimum number of tables to order

PARAMETERS.name: max_tables
PARAMETERS.description: Maximum number of tables to order

PARAMETERS.name: tables_from_A_and_B_min
PARAMETERS.description: Sum of tables supplied from Suppler A and B is at least 25

PARAMETERS.name: tables_from_B_and_C_min
PARAMETERS.description: Sum of tables supplied from Supplier B and C is at least 30

PARAMETERS.name: tables_from_A_min
PARAMETERS.description: If the restaurant decides to order tables from Supplier A, it must also order at least 30 tables from Supplier B

PARAMETERS.name: max_tables_from_A
PARAMETERS.description: Total tables supplied from Supplier A can not exceed 60
